item.title: ETF 的平均寿命变短了
item.description:
WZRD 和 CHAI 宣布关闭基金

。【原文：

WZRD and CHAI announce fund closures

】

item.title: 投资 SpaceX、OpenAI 的科技基金在飙升 1000% 后下挫
item.description: 一家持有埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 SpaceX、OpenAI 和 Epic Games Inc.等私营科技公司股票的封闭式基金自一个月前上市以来，一直在很大程度上无视地心引力，直到现在。【原文：A closed-end fund that holds shares of private technology firms like Elon Musk’s SpaceX, OpenAI and Epic Games Inc. has been mostly defying gravity since its debut a month ago, until now.】

item.title: 管道原油流量预示美国产出增长放缓
item.description: 据研究公司伍德麦肯兹有限公司（Wood Mackenzie Ltd.）称，全美输油管道的实际原油流量与去年持平，这凸显了 2024 年石油产量增长乏力的估计。【原文：Physical crude oil flows in pipelines across the US are flat compared with last year, underscoring estimates that oil production will grow little in 2024, according to research firm Wood Mackenzie Ltd.】

item.title: NerdWallet 因贷款回落影响信用卡收入而下跌
item.description: NerdWallet Inc. 的主要信用卡收入因发卡机构收紧贷款而下降，但国际扩张和新的人工智能产品有望帮助该公司在今年晚些时候恢复增长。【原文：NerdWallet Inc. fell after its key credit card revenue declined due to issuers tightening lending, though an international expansion and new artificial intelligence offering are expected to aid a return to growth later this year.】

item.title: 凯雷集团称正在考虑 Tamko 的各种选择，包括出售
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. and the family owners of Tamko Building Products are considering a sale that could value the maker of roof shingles at more than $3.5 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 巴克莱称墨西哥公司正排队出售股票
item.description: 据巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）在墨西哥的负责人称，墨西哥公司正在推进出售股票的计划，寻求重新获得全球股票投资者的青睐。【原文：Mexican companies are pushing ahead with plans to sell shares, seeking to tap renewed interest from global equity investors, according to the head of Barclays Plc in the country.】

item.title: 无人机袭击后俄罗斯炼油厂维修受阻
item.description: 俄罗斯的石油加工率仍然面临压力，因为从无人机袭击中勉强恢复过来的炼油厂进入了季节性维护。【原文：Russia’s oil-processing rates remain under pressure as refineries, which have barely recovered from drone attacks, enter seasonal maintenance.】

item.title: Snap 股价飙升是收益波动的最新例证
item.description: 对于投资者来说，Snap 公司周五财报后的大幅波动并不新鲜。这次不同的是方向：向上。【原文：Snap Inc.’s sizable post-earnings swing Friday is nothing new to its investors. What’s different this time is the direction: up.】

item.title: 南方铜业在金属市场疲软的情况下上调产量预测
item.description: 随着矿石质量的改善和墨西哥供水问题的解决，南方铜业公司（Southern Copper Corp.【原文：Southern Copper Corp. raised its annual production guidance as ore quality improves and the company resolves water supply issues in Mexico, offering a little relief for a tightening global copper market.】

item.title: 财报显示人工智能实力强劲，Alphabet 跃入 2 万亿美元俱乐部
item.description: 周五，Alphabet 公司的市值果断跃升至 2 万亿美元以上，因为一份强劲的财报让投资者确信，谷歌母公司将成为人工智能领域的主要参与者。【原文：Alphabet Inc. jumped decisively above a $2 trillion market capitalization on Friday, as a powerhouse earnings report reassured investors that the Google parent would be a major player in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 瑞银分析师称英国工党可能会打击银行在英国央行的存款
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS）的分析师表示，投资者开始担心未来的工党政府可能会通过减少商业银行在英格兰银行的存款收益来为公共服务筹集资金。【原文：Investors are starting to worry that a future Labour government could seek to raise money for public services by reducing the amount commercial banks earn on deposits held at the Bank of England, analysts at UBS said.】

item.title: 石油产量再次下降，墨西哥国家石油公司（Pemex）勉强实现微利
item.description: 墨西哥国有石油巨头第一季度略有盈利，但产量有所下滑，政府的支持帮助支撑了这家负债累累的公司。【原文：Mexico’s state oil giant posted a slight profit in the first quarter as production slipped, with government support helping to prop up the debt-saddled company.】

item.title: 巴菲特房产经纪公司与房地产经纪人案达成和解
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：HomeServices of America, a real estate brokerage owned by Berkshire Hathaway Inc., reached a settlement agreement in a lawsuit taking aim at agent commissions industrywide.】

item.title: Codelco 产量再次下滑，凸显铜业困境
item.description: 由于智利矿山老化，矿石质量下降，顶级铜生产商 Codelco 的季度产量出现下降。【原文：Top copper producer Codelco saw a decline in quarterly output due to lower quality ore at its aging Chilean mines — the latest sign of supply-side struggles that have helped send metal prices to two-year highs.】

item.title: 保时捷利润下滑 30%，原因是车型更新和中国市场下滑
item.description: 受车型更迭和中国需求疲软的影响，保时捷第一季度利润大幅下滑，创下自 2022 年 9 月上市以来的最差业绩。【原文：Porsche AG’s profit plummeted during the first quarter for the weakest result since listing in September 2022 after model changeovers and soft demand in China weighed.】

item.title: 欧元区通胀率将成为欧洲央行通往 2%道路上的第一个障碍
通胀数据强化鲍威尔的 "长期偏高 "观点
item.description: 周五公布的最新通胀数据巩固了美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔上周发出的信息，即高利率暂时不会改变。【原文：Fresh inflation data released Friday cemented the message from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell last week that high interest rates are here to stay for now.】

item.title: 红鸟国际传媒集团（RedBird IMI）将在英国禁令后启动《电讯报》的销售工作
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，红鸟国际投资公司（RedBird IMI）将放弃对《每日电讯报》的收购，此举很可能引发英国报业集团的又一场竞购战。【原文：RedBird IMI is set to walk away from its takeover of the Telegraph, according to a person familiar with the matter, in a move likely to trigger another bidding war for the UK newspaper group.】

item.title: 美国 IPO "焦土年 "的结束取决于利率下降
item.description: 越来越多的公司开始涌入重新焕发活力的首次公开募股市场，如果美联储最终不再在降息问题上踌躇不前，那么这一趋势可能会有更大的发展空间。【原文：Companies are increasingly piling into a re-energized market for initial public offerings, and if the Federal Reserve finally stops punting on interest rate cuts, the trend may have room to run.】

item.title: 菲尔-休斯顿讲述识别商业谎言的技巧
item.description:
提出他人未能提出的问题。【原文：

Asking the questions others fail to.

】

item.title: 水煮青蛙 "还是新常态？摩根大通在两种情况之间切换
item.description:
"布鲁斯-卡斯曼说："我们并不试图做出强有力的决定

'We're not trying to make a strong call,' Bruce Kasman says

【原文：

‘We’re not trying to make a strong call,’ Bruce Kasman says

】

item.title: 市政监管机构警告购买 "建设美国 "债券的风险
item.description: 市政债券市场监管机构向投资者发出警告，提醒他们注意购买 "建设美国债券"（Build America Bonds）的风险，这些债券的交易价格超过 1 美元 100 美分，随着政府越来越多地通过再融资回购这些债券，购买者将面临潜在的损失。【原文：The municipal-bond market’s regulator issued a warning to investors about the risks of buying Build America Bonds that are trading at more than 100 cents on the dollar, which exposes buyers to potential losses as governments increasingly buy them back under refinancings.】

item.title: 巴西 XP 公司任命新财务总监，计划对董事会进行调整
item.description: 巴西最大的经纪公司之一 XP Inc. 周五发表声明，任命维克多-曼苏尔（Victor Mansur）为新任首席财务官，并将选举四名新的独立董事进入董事会。【原文：XP Inc., one of Brazil’s largest brokerage firms, appointed Victor Mansur as its new chief financial officer and will elect four new independent directors to its board, according to a Friday statement.】

item.title: Adnoc 收购伊拉克石油，计划出口价格更高的原油
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国石油巨头阿布扎比国家石油公司（Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.【原文：United Arab Emirates oil giant Abu Dhabi National Oil Co. imported a crude oil cargo in a rare move after upgrading its only refinery, which will allow it to sell more of its own higher-value barrels.】

item.title: Eskom 预计南非因发电量稳定而减少电力削减
item.description: 南非电力公司 Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. 预测，由于发电性能提高，在即将到来的冬季需求增加的月份里，南非的停电现象将有所减少。【原文：South Africa’s power utility Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. forecast reduced blackouts for the country during upcoming winter months, when demand increases, due to improved electricity generation performance.】

item.title: 日本 Jera 公司寻求投资中东氢能项目
item.description: 日本最大的公用事业公司 Jera Co. 正在寻求在中东投资低碳氢气和合成氨项目，此外还将购买这些项目的产出。【原文：Japan’s biggest utility, Jera Co., is looking to invest in low-carbon hydrogen and ammonia projects in the Middle East, in addition to buying their output.】

item.title: 英国监察机构在受到批评后加倍实施 "点名羞辱 "计划
item.description: 英国金融监管机构回击了对其计划的批评，该机构计划在早期阶段点名调查公司，并认为这将提高透明度和威慑力。【原文：The UK’s financial watchdog pushed back against criticism of its plan to name firms it’s investigating at an early stage, which it thinks will boost transparency and deterrence.】

item.title: 派普桑德勒聘用杰富瑞金融科技银行家 Freiman 和 Greene
item.description: 派博桑德勒公司从杰富瑞金融集团公司（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：Piper Sandler Cos. hired Rob Freiman and Kegan Greene from Jefferies Financial Group Inc. as managing directors on its technology investment banking team.】

item.title: 伦敦矿业王冠面临盎格鲁 390 亿美元收购的威胁
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group）试图吞并英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc），这是对伦敦股市最受青睐的板块之一的最新威胁，此前有猜测称，大宗商品领域的其他巨头也可能放弃在英国上市。【原文：BHP Group’s attempt to swallow up Anglo American Plc is the latest threat to one of the London stock market’s most-prized sectors, following speculation that other big names in the commodities space could ditch their UK listings.】

item.title: 南非兰特飙升，稳定联盟的可能性上升
item.description: 一项民意调查显示，在下个月的全国大选中出现一个对市场有利的联盟的可能性增大，兰特汇率因此创下了今年以来的最大涨幅。【原文：The rand strengthened by the most this year after publication of an opinion poll that boosted the odds of a market-friendly coalition emerging from national elections next month.】
